title: gItavANiyE kIravANiyE
sahitya:
gItavANiyE kIravANiyE kiraNam paravum vEda vANiyE


anupallavi

  AdhAra OmkASra vINaiyE Anandak-kaDalil ADum dONiyE


caraNam    eNNum eNNamellAm paNNishaigaLAgi paNNishaigaLellAm kaNNulagamAgi
maNNuDala vAzhvu viNNamuda UtrAi mangaLam poliyap-pongi viLaiyADum
